title: Changing my birthday
body: I know it sounds silly but when I signed up for League of Legends, I accidentally put the [Riot edit]  instead of the [Riot Edit]. Could I possibly get that changed?

replies.body:
The TLDR; Unfortunately not :(

Once you sign-up, that information is locked.  We keep it secure because we use some personal information at sign-up to help players recover their accounts if they forget their password, or somehow lose their account.  I edited out the information for you, so make sure to keep it safe so no one can use it to steal your account!

As long as you remember what you put, you should have no problems in recovering it if it ever becomes a problem.  Let me know if you have any other questions about it!  ^.^
